amendment.description: To strike the provision requiring the Secretary of the Interior to conduct an inventory and analysis of oil and natural gas resources beneath all of the waters of the outer Continental Shelf.

vote.text: Amendment SA 884 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 221.

action.text: Amendment SA 884 proposed by Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S7702-7707; text: CR S7702) To strike the provision requiring the Secretary of the Interior to conduct an inventory and analysis of oil and natural gas resources beneath all of the waters of the outer Continental Shelf.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 884 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 221.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 884 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 221.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 884 proposed by Senator Graham FL.
